Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six
(H) seven
(I) eight
(J) nine
(K) ten
(L) eleven
(M) twelve
(N) thirteen
(O) fourteen
(P) fifteen
(Q) sixteen
output: A: Let's think step by step. If I remove all the notebooks from the floor, there are 3 - 3 = 2 grey cat toys. So the answer is (C).
task_prompt:
Answer extremely simple questions about the colors of objects on a surface.
